body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Sparkmage is played by the user
2. The AI has no creature, and Magarena automatically chooses target = computer

The AI should normally lose one life because of Sparkmage entering the battlefied.  Instead, no life is lost.

Magarena 1.19, Mac OS X.
